mapper.insert: insert into SYS_DIC (SEQ_ID, DIC_TYPE, DIC_CODE, DIC_NAME, STATUS, REMARK, UPDATE_TIME, CREATE_TIME, CREATE_PERSON, UPDATE_PERSON) values (#{seqId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{dicType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dicCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dicName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{createPerson,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updatePerson,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.select: select SEQ_ID, DIC_TYPE, DIC_CODE, DIC_NAME, STATUS, REMARK, UPDATE_TIME, CREATE_TIME, CREATE_PERSON, UPDATE_PERSON from SYS_DIC
mapper.insert: insert into SYS_DIC (SEQ_ID, DIC_TYPE, DIC_CODE, DIC_NAME, STATUS, REMARK, UPDATE_TIME, CREATE_TIME, CREATE_PERSON, UPDATE_PERSON) values (#{seqId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{dicType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dicCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dicName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{createPerson,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updatePerson,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
